name: Fortinet FortiClientEMS输入验证错误漏洞
product: ["Fortinet FortiClientEMS Cloud >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.4", "Fortinet FortiClientEms >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.4", "Fortinet FortiClientEms 7.0.*", "Fortinet FortiClientEms 6.4.*", "Fortinet FortiClientEMS Cloud 7.4.0", "Fortinet FortiClientEMS Cloud 7.0.*", "Fortinet FortiClientEMS Cloud 6.4.*", "Fortinet FortiClientEms 7.4.0"]
description: Fortinet FortiClientEMS是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的Fortinet提供的端点管理解决方案的一部分，旨在帮助组织有效地管理其网络中的终端设备，并提供端点安全性的监控和控制。Fortinet FortiClientEMS存在输入验证错误漏洞，该漏洞源于通信渠道漏洞来源验证不当。远程攻击者可利用该漏洞通过会话连接绕过受信任的主机功能。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-24-078
patch: Fortinet FortiClientEMS输入验证错误漏洞的补丁
